items.name: Cloak of Defiance
explicitMods: When Hit, 10% of Damage is taken from Mana before Life
Supported Skills apply supported Curses on Hit
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Active Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: An arc of lightning stretches from the caster to a targeted nearby enemy and chains on to additional targets.
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, making them less resistant to elemental damage.
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, making them less resistant to fire damage and giving them a chance to be ignited by fire damage.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have +13% chance to be Ignited by Fire Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, making them take increased physical damage and degeneration.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies take 28% increased Physical damage
Cursed enemies take 33% increased damage from Damage Over Time effects
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Throws a trap that, when triggered by an enemy, converts that enemy to your side for a short duration. Does not affect unique monsters or players.
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Doedre's Damning
flavourText: Where her mouth should have been
there was only a whirling, black void.

explicitMods: Upgrades a normal item to a magic item
items.descrText:
Right click this item then left click a normal item to apply it.
Shift click to unstack.

items.typeLine: Sapping Hallowed Life Flask of Grounding
explicitMods: Removes 10% of Life Recovered from Mana when used
Immunity to Shock during flask effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

Right click this item then left click an unidentified item to apply it.
Shift click to unstack.

explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 39 or lower
You cannot Cast Supported Spells directly
Casts Supported Spells when you take a total of 700 Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Active Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Performs a warcry, adding endurance charges proportional to the number of surrounding enemies. Taunts all nearby enemies to attack the caster.
explicitMods: 21 Endurance Charges granted per one hundred nearby enemies
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Aurseize
flavourText: Wealth is not to be borne lightly.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts a delayed teleport to a target destination. When the teleport occurs, lightning damage is dealt to the area around both where the player was and where they teleported to.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summons an icy shield that protects against physical and fire damage. It drains your mana while active and at a faster rate while you are moving. When you have no mana left, the skill turns off. While active, it leaves a trail of ground ice which lasts for a short duration.
explicitMods: Additional 176 Mana drained per second while moving
